content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Take the Kombat to the streets fight anywhere, anytime, all in the palm of your hand.

As of May 31, 2014 online matchmaking will no longer function for Mortal Kombat due to Gamespy removing its online infrastructure and support for a number of titles. WB Games evaluated a large number of migration solutions, including extensive discussions with the engineering team at NetherRealm Studios. Due to the complexities of supporting the game’s older networking framework, there was no feasible way to integrate a new network layer. This was a very difficult realization for us given the passion we have for the game.

Please also note that it might not be possible to obtain all the trophies once the online functionality has been shut down. If you have further questions about the shutdown of these services, please visit http://support.wbgames.com

1-2 player(s)
3074KB Minimum
